pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/7fe612cd-1075-4407-ad2c-38aa468758fa) for commit fe04ba41f85e61ec514610306e16030b06a05722.Found no runs to compare against.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/677c4695-c0dd-4c67-91df-0b3c0b6c2da3) for commit b119b9ec0f082e0c95223f7a1b124245aba30a67.Found no runs to compare against.

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/d402cd2c-c6b6-44da-b994-5e621b1383ac) for commit e9d4313a3f50f0981d42990d9590236a76fb7741.
There were [no significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/dfc68416-af86-45f9-b7d6-0c99e69aa518/to/d402cd2c-c6b6-44da-b994-5e621b1383ac) against commit a32c8957ace84c4809272ea8ebafb49abbc8f382.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9447033708/job/26017965498)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9447033708/job/26017965992)
This theorem can now be proved by `infer_instance`. It was also apparently never used.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(Topology/Category): derive `Preregular` instances for `Profinite` and `Stonean` from the one on `CompHaus`
